### <a href="https://sanzal.com" target="_blank">Sanzal</a>

A web app for gaining insights about Nepali Twitter space by analyzing the public data about Twitter users in Nepal. <a href="https://nbviewer.org/github/ayushrajdahal/NepaliTwitterSentimentAnalysis/blob/master/Sentiment%20Analysis.ipynb" target="_blank">[link to proof of concept]</a>

### <a href="https://fb.watch/gh7RGsXom_/" target="_blank">Apravasi</a>

A socio-economic analysis of Nepalese population living in the US, created as a part of my research fellowship at <a href="https://www.incubatenepal.com/" target="_blank">Incubate Nepal</a>.
